page.title: 15LIBRARY
page.content:
{Simon Boyce age 11
In{Briscoe Road}there is a public {Branch Library}There are roughly about 17000 books. Besides{books}they also lend out{records,cassetes and books {with large print}for partially sighted readers.It was opened on 26th May 1938.It is opened five days a week - Monday,Tuesday,Thursday,Friday and Saturday.When a{book}is lost or not returned they make the person pay the cost of the{book.}There are five staff who work in the{library}- the head {librarian}and 4 assistants.They lend out about 2800{books}a month.It has always been used as a{library.}The charge for an overdue{book}is 7p for juniors and 20p for adults per week.The borrowing and lending of {books}is recorded on a{computer}which is linked to the main{library computer
